item.description:
NEW DATE! Apologies, scheduling conflict with the room /projector.
Color trending and Logo trends
Jacque, Design and Marketing for Tibet Collection, just returned from the summer NY International Gift Fair. where there are nine miles of aisles crammed with everything in the world you could possibly imagine. She is working on the annual trend reports for the import/gift industry and would like to share her research on current logo, color and design trends.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Color and Logo Trends
